description:
Demolition of buildings and redevelopment of land and buildings to provide a new building to comprise residential accommodation (Class C3 27, 574 sqm comprising 284 units) and new education and performance space for the Guildhall School of Music & Drama with ancillary plant and servicing and associated ancillary uses (Class D1 12,887 sq m); new retail floor space (Class A1, A3 230sq m); the pedestrian walkway, works of hard and soft landscaping,  alterations to existing vehicular and pedestrian access and highway layout together with associated and enabling works. (Amendments to scheme submitted December 2006).
The proposal involves a departure from one or more policies of development plan in force in the area.
The application involves the discontinuance of a City Walkway and stair on the site and the bridge over Silk Street and Moor Lane linking speed House, Milton Court and city Point.
